title: ✦STUNNING 2Bed/2Bath in Packard's Corner (9/1)(Water inc.)(NO FEE)
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 147492315', 'Rent: $4,400 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Rent Includes:: Water', 'Parking:: attached garage', 'Beautiful 2 bedroom/2 bathroom apartment available in Allston.', "Conveniently located next to Packard's corner, public transportation, and a variety of shops and restaurants.", 'Unit features newly renovated bathrooms, living room and kitchen with granite counter-tops, stainless steel appliances, and dishwasher/disposal.', 'Gleaming hardwood floors throughout.', 'High end finishes.', 'Large bedrooms.', 'Laundry in unit.', 'Garage parking available for rent.', 'Pet friendly.', 'WATER INCLUDED IN RENT// NO BROKER FEE', 'Please call/email Chris to schedule a showing!', '7812281766', 'chrisg 'Bus: 86 367 Western Ave opp Brighton Mills Mall (0.49 mi)', 'Tram: B Harvard Avenue (0.46 mi)', 'Rail: Framingham/Worcester Line Boston Landing (0.21 mi)', 'Bus: 66 Brighton Ave @ Cambridge St (0.17 mi)', 'Chris Gemayel', 'Phone: 781 228 1766', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC', '107 Brighton Avenue', 'Boston, MA 02134', "Not what you're looking for?", 'Message me anyways!', 'I have access to one of the largest apartment databases in Greater Boston and would love to help with your next home search!', "Search Boston's largest selection of apartments <URL>", 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
